thread.title: Michelle Corley
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Michelle Corley

author: Michelle Corley
title: Michelle Corley
text: It has been very easy to work with Molly Stevens at Costa Rican vacations. She is always very thorough and prompt with all of our plans. She has offered a lot of suggestions and options for our perfect experience and we are looking forward to an amazing family trip to Costa rica. I highly recommend this service!
